title: Scoreboard: Checking the scoreboard changes to the next day
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And that the season isn't over
And it's before 10 AM EST on the device
custom_steps:
When you go to the Scoreboard section before 10 AM EST on the device
And the scoreboard is on the previous day's results
And wait till the device time is after 10AM EST
And then reload the scoreboard (by going to a different view, News, Standings etc...)
custom_expected: Then Scoreboard will show today's games

title: Scoreboard: Opening the Scoreboard in different timezones - Continental US
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And at least one game has not started yet
custom_steps:
When you set your device's timezone to a timezone within the Continental US (eastern, central, mountain, or western)
And go to the Scoreboard section
custom_expected:
Then the times on the games that have not started yet should reflect the time local to the devices timezone.

**REPEAT to confirm all timezones in the Continental US are showing up properly**

title: Scoreboard: Opening the Scoreboard in different timezones - Outside Continental US
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there is at least 1 game that has not started that day
custom_steps: When you set your device's timezone to one outside the Continental US (like GMT)
custom_expected: Then the times on the games that have not started yet should default to EST.

title: Scoreboard: Game sorting - all games in preview
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And all the games are in a preview state
custom_steps:
When you go to the Scoreboard page
And navigate to a date in the future where all the games are in preview state
custom_expected: Then the games should be sorted by start time; early to late

title: Scoreboard: Game sorting - all games are final
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And all the games on that day are final
custom_steps: When you go to Scoreboard on the date where all the games are final
custom_expected: Then the games will be sorted by the start times of the games that are final; early to late

title: Scoreboard: Game sorting - games in preview, live, and final
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And you are on a date where games are in preview, live, and final at the same time
custom_steps: When you go to Scoreboard page on that date
custom_expected:
Then games will be sorted games that are live will show up first sorted by start time
And then after live games come games in preview sorted by start time
And finally after preview games come the games that are in a final state sorted by start time

title: Scoreboard: Checking the scoreboard's readability and accuracy
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there are games on the date you are on
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard section with games
custom_expected:
Then the games will have clear & readable text
And the teams logos are accurate

title: Scoreboard: Scoreboard updating
custom_preconds:
Given that you are on the Scoreboard
And there are active games that date
custom_steps: When you go to Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then active games should update at the rate specified in the settings page

title: Scoreboard: Tapping on a game cell
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there are games that date
custom_steps: When you tap on a game cell
custom_expected: Then you will be brought to gameday section for that game

title: Scoreboard: Choosing a date using date picker
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And you are choosing a date that is within the limit of the current season
custom_steps:
When you tap the date picker in the top left
And drag down the calender to find the desired month
And tap the desired date
custom_expected: Then the scheduled games for that date will load

title: Scoreboard: Going back today's games from another date using the Today button
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard page
And that you are on a date that is not today
And that today's date is within the limit of the current season
custom_steps: When you tap the 'Today' button on the top left next to the date picker
custom_expected: Then today's scheduled games will load

title: Scoreboard: Trying to choose a date outside the limits of the current season
custom_preconds: Given you are on the Scoreboard section
custom_steps:
When you tap the date picker
And attempt to scroll down past the end of the season
And attempt to scroll up past the beginning the season
custom_expected:
Then the scrolling will not go past the last month of the season
And the scrolling will not go past the first month of the season

title: Scoreboard: Coming back to Scoreboard from a different section
custom_preconds: Given you have visited the Scoreboard page
custom_steps:
When you go to the Scoreboard section
And tap the date picker
And choose a date within the season
And a date that is not today
And go to the news section
And go back to the Scoreboard section
custom_expected: Then the Scoreboard will load today's scheduled games instead of the date you last were on the last time you were on the Scoreboard section

title: Scoreboard: Date with no games
custom_preconds: Given you are on the Scoreboard section
custom_steps:
When you tap on the date picker
And choose a date that does not have any games scheduled
custom_expected: Then it should say "There are no games scheduled for today" in the main section

title: Scoreboard: Checking an active game tile
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And you are on a date with an active game
custom_steps: When you look at the game tile for an active game
custom_expected:
Then you should see the what inning the game
And who is up to bat (Top, Bot, Mid)
And line score should be populated; R, H, E
And base indicator will appear showing who is on base
And the Ball, Strike, and Out counters will appear populated
And the current pitcher will be listed with his win-loss record and ERA
And the 2 teams play will show up with their respective logos
And the records of the 2 teams playing will be underneath their corresponding teams
And the current batter will be listed with his hits-at bats and batting average

title: Scoreboard: Checking a preview game tile
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there is a game in preview state on that date
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then you will see the game start time in the top right of the cell
And the line score will not be populated
And the 2 teams playing will show with their logs
And the records of the 2 teams will show up underneath their corresponding teams
And the projected starting pitchers will show

title: Scoreboard: Checking a game that is final
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard
And on that date there is a game that is final
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then you will see 'Final'
And the line score will be populated with the final game stats
And you will see the winning pitcher with the win-loss record as well as ERA
And you will see the losing pitcher with the win-loss record as well as ERA
And if a pitcher earned a save you will see that pitcher's name as well as the number of saves he has earned that season

title: Scoreboard: Checking a pregame delay game tile
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard
And there are games on that date
And there is a game that is in a pregame delay state
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then you will see the game start time
And the reason for the delay next to the game start time
And everything else you would see for a game in preview state

title: Scoreboard: Checking an in game delay game tile
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard
And there is a game on that date that is in a in game delay
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then you will see the inning that the delay happened
And the reason for the delay or just delayed
And all the other properties of an active game

title: Scoreboard: Checking a postponed game tile
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there is a game on that date that is postponed
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard section
custom_expected:
Then you see 'Postponed'
And the rest of the tile will be as a game in preview tile would be
And the game will be sorted to the end of the games like a final game

title: Scoreboard: Checking a suspended game tile
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there is a game that has been suspended on that date
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard on that date
custom_expected:
Then you will see the inning the game was suspended in
And the word 'Suspended'
And the rest of the tile will be as it last was before the game was suspended
And the game will be sorted the the end of the Scoreboard with the final games

title: Scoreboard: Checking a game that finished early or went to extra innings
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard
And there is a game on that date that has completed early
And there is a game on that date that has been completed in extra innings
custom_steps: When you go the Scoreboard on that date
custom_expected:
Then in both cases you will see 'Final/<the inning in the game was completed in>'
And the rest of the tile will have the properties of a Final game
And the game will be sorted to the end of the Scoreboard

title: Scoreboard: Checking a game that is in warmup
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard
And on that date there is a game in warmup
custom_steps: When you go to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then you will see 'Warmup'
And no innings or game time
And the rest of the tile will be like an active game and sort the the beginning of the Scoreboard

title: Scoreboard: Background the app and coming back to the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the Scoreboard section
And there is an active game on that date
custom_steps:
When you go to the Scoreboard section
And background the app
And wait about 10-15 minutes
And then go back into the app
custom_expected: Then as Scoreboard section loads again the active game should have updated immediately with the most recent game data
